issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Base UI => Views => Web Views => XHR to Filesystem

test opens google.com, writes it to a file in applicationDataDirectory, then uses native path to create web view

{html}
fields.summary: xhr -> write html file -> render web view  = !work

comments.body:
{html}

this was an awesome issue.

when you fetch google via XHR he'll return WAP instead of HTML content. WebView can't render WAP. i just fake the User-Agent in XHR request (which is a good test too) and get him to give me back HTML and it works.

{html}
